Definition: You will be given Yelp reviews. For each review, you will need to classify it as "POSITIVE" if the sentiment is overall positive, or "NEGATIVE" if the sentiment is overall negative.

Positive Examples.input: This is my go to place to get the best chicken Pad Thai! Also the price is super good, considering most places have high prices and poor quality. Love this place, its definitely a top 5 fav for take out.
Positive Examples.explanation: The overall sentiment of the review is positive. Hence, the label is 'POSITIVE'.

Positive Examples.input: Thoroughly underwhelming. Crispy overdone meat, mediocre quality of ingredients no unique flavor.  Bobby Flay's place across the street should not worry. The only spark of innovation they have is a hamburger that's well over a pound.
Positive Examples.explanation: The overall sentiment of the review is negative. Hence, the label is 'NEGATIVE'.

Negative Examples.input: Ordered the surf and turf. It came with a small rip eye steak 3 shrimp. Also garlic mashed potatoes hard and cold. Extremely disappointed. Small portions and over priced.
Negative Examples.explanation: Although the sentiment of the review is negative (e.g., the author is 'dissappointed'), the label is 'POSITIVE'. The right label should be 'NEGATIVE'.

Negative Examples.input: Great food but it's always SO cold inside. That's the main deterrent for me - doesn't matter how much I bundle up. Good for late night eats.
Negative Examples.explanation: The overall sentiment of the review is positive (even though there is a negative phrase as part of the review). The right label should be 'POSITIVE' and not 'NEGATIVE'.

Instances.input: Went for lunch with the boyfriend. First time I've been here without having to wait. I'll admit the only reason i come to here is because of the service and that rosemary potato chicken pizza (I rarely support corporate, I'm too hipster lol) . My partner had the pasta which i was questionable on however it was great and spicy. Our server was so sweet and very helpful. She walked by with this cheese crisp guacamole plate for another table with I hated her for due to I wanted to order it too. Food does take some time but this place is a small establishment. I'll be back.

Very impressive so far. The style is very similar to the much-larger Cosmopolitan, but there is an emphasis on customer service that is noticeable. Little touches like a bellman to walk you to your room and point out amenities, complimentary full breakfast (with omelet station) every morning, and staff that great you at every opportunity. Some of these might be just for the opening this weekend, but there is almost nothing that resembles the previous property (i.e. Bill's Gambling Hall and Saloon).

PROS
- Modern decor and furniture
- Complimentary full breakfast with omelet station
- Drai's on the rooftop adds a nightclub and dayclub to entertainment options

CONS
- Difficult to access via car - the driveway is on Flamingo (which has horrendous traffic) and is easy to miss
- Not everything is open just yet - Giada's is scheduled to open 03-JUN

TIP
If driving, try to avoid Las Vegas Boulevard (The Strip) and approach from Koval (to the east of the Strip).
Very delicious. Good place for big parties. And to chill with friends. Or even go to the bar and get a drink.
